pages.text: About Us A Clearwater Beach Hotel With Contemporary Style From the moment you arrive, our goal is to take your mind and spirit to where it needs to be. Forget everything and allow yourself to experience all that this brand-new world-class resort has to offer. Your stay includes drifting away on the spacious sundeck along the sparkling outdoor pool, keeping up your exercise routine in the third-floor fitness center overlooking the beach and Gulf, and indulging in soothing treatments at our relaxing Pallavi Spa. Gallery Spa Hotel Amenities & Services Guest room Comfort Features Plush BeWell Bedding 50" HDTV with DirecTV High-speed Wired and Wireless Internet AM/FM Alarm Clock Radio with iPhone Dock Self-controlled AC and Heating Keurig coffee maker with premium coffees and teas 2 PATH refillable and 100% recyclable aluminum bottled waters Mini Refrigerator Iron and Ironing Board Hair Dryer Meet the Team Meet the Team A team with decades of industry experience, diverse backgrounds, and a love for Clearwater Beach, you couldn't be in better hands. Get to know the Wyndham Grand Clearwater Beach team, and see how our passions drive us to make your stay one to remember. Contact Us Stay Connected to Wyndham Grand Clearwater Welcome to the Wyndham Grand Clearwater Beach. We look forward to having you as our guest and will do all that we can to ensure that your stay is memorable and relaxing. Wyndham Grand Clearwater Beach 100 Coronado Drive Clearwater Beach, FL 33767 Phone: (727) 281-9500 For press, media, or influencer inquiries, please contact us at wyndhamgrandclearwaterbeach @candrpr .com. Gallery Spa From the North Take I-75 S to FL-60 W in Tampa, follow FL-60 W to Coronado Dr./S. Gulfview Blvd in Clearwater, destination is on the right From the South Take I-75 N to FL-60 W in Tampa, follow FL-60 W to Coronado Dr./S. Gulfview Blvd in Clearwater, destination is on the right From the East Take I-4 West to FL-60 W in Tampa, follow FL-60 W to Coronado Dr./S.
